short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The network for learning. Connect with like-minded people, discover valuable learning resources and organize your knowledge base.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Knowably Extension for Chrome - easy way to save articles, videos, books and more.
When you find something useful or interesting, put it in Knowably and then you cand find it in your collections. Your followers see your public added items.

Extension Features:
* One-click saving of any page with the toolbar button or keyboard shortcut
* "Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + S" to save current page into your library
* Use collections to organize your saves
* Completely free

Build your personal learning network and share valuable findings with like-minded people!
